content: Pick the dice from the DLR cabinet.

{
    "chain_of_thought": "Absolutely! 100% tee-ah-go approved! First, I'll roll on over to the DLR kitchen, find the cabinet, and grab the dice. Task complete!",
    "pattern_type": "A",
    "object": "dice",

}

    "pattern_type": "B",
